attributes.action: Sign up to a new law making Ecocide a crime at Rio+20
attributes.additional_details:
Speak up at Rio+20 Conference and call for the signing of a new international law to make “Ecocide”( i.e large-scale industrial damage of the environment) the fifth “crime against peace”- alongside genocide and crimes against humanity.

This would ensure the survival of all life, people and planet and must be put before profit.
